subject: feat: implement Koinz Style Guide for dashboard
body:
Complete visual redesign following the Koinz Style Guide specification:

- Dark-only theme with Koinz color palette (#1B1B1B background, #2a2a2a cards, #2D68FF primary)
- Figtree font family loaded from Google Fonts
- 8px base spacing system
- Updated border radius (4px/8px/12px for sm/md/lg)
- Redesigned components: cards, buttons, inputs, tags, badges
- Chart.js colors updated to match Koinz palette
- Removed light mode toggle (dark-only mode)
- Modal backdrop uses rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8)
- Tags/badges use transparent backgrounds with colored borders
